invocations.description: Returns true if you are currently hungry.
invocations.ex:
auto(5000)
if $hungry then
	while $foodtime < 1000 * 60 * 5 do
		useitem("brown mushroom")
	end
end
invocations.exDescription: This persistent hotkey script will check if you are hungry. If you are it will eat brown mushrooms until you have eaten 5 minutes worth of food.
